#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define mod 1000000007
typedef long long int ll;
using namespace std;

ll A[1111111];

int main()
{
    ll t, fact, n, a, i, j, k;
    cin >> t;
    fact = 1;
    A[0] = 0;
    A[1] = 1;
    for (i = 2; i <= 1000000; i++) {
        fact = (((fact * i) + mod) % mod);
        A[i] = ((A[i - 1] + fact + mod) % mod);
    }

    while (t--) {
        cin >> a >> n;
        cout << (A[n] - A[a-1] + mod) % mod << endl;
    }

    return 0;
}
